subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The mood at Port St. Lucie, the spring training lair of the Mets, is indisputably upbeat, especially with the return of pitcher Matt Harvey. Players have trained their eyes on the playoffs.
snippet: The mood at Port St. Lucie, the spring training lair of the Mets, is indisputably upbeat, especially with the return of pitcher Matt Harvey. Players have trained their eyes on the playoffs.
